meanings.definition: To generate ideas or solutions through group discussion and collaboration.
meanings.sent1: Yesterday, we brainstormed ideas for our school project.
meanings.sent2: We always brainstorm ideas together during our team meetings.
meanings.sent3: The friends brainstormed fun activities for the weekend.
meanings.sent4: She brainstormed a brilliant plan to solve the puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The students brainstormed creative ways to decorate the classroom.

meanings.sent1: Last week, we brainstormed and came up with a great solution.
meanings.sent2: They brainstormed all night to find the answer.
meanings.sent3: The team brainstormed so much, they ran out of ideas!
meanings.sent4: He brainstormed his way out of the difficult situation.
meanings.sent5: After they brainstormed, they felt accomplished and proud.
